short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension of Sarallagani for your comfort.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sarallagani is a powerful Chrome extension designed to simplify tracking and managing your stocks on the Nepal Stock Exchange (NEPSE). With real-time NEPSE data at your fingertips, you can easily monitor your favorite stocks by adding them to personalized watchlists. As a part of Sarallagani.com, the extension also allows seamless synchronization of your stock details from MeroShare directly into your Sarallagani portfolio.

Additionally, Sarallagani offers a convenient floating window feature, enabling you to view essential stock information without navigating away from the page you're on, enhancing productivity and streamlining data extraction. Whether you're actively trading or simply monitoring, Sarallagani keeps you connected to the stock market with ease.
